void inGameMenu ( Inventory &  inventory,
const string &  currentLocation,
int &  time 
)

The main menu of the Dandyville Game that runs at the beginning of the game

Parameters:
inventory A reference to the player's ingame inventory
currentLocation A reference to the player's current location in game (important for saving)
time A reference to the players "InGame Playtime"

force player to enter '0' or '1' or '2' if they do not enter the necessary input ask again

case 0 shall be save to save/save1.txt

resume game so just break from the function

check the inventory

check the time

Quit the game

default handles ... not sure if default case would ever happen

this function will display the main menu at the start of the game

The main menu of the Dandyville Game that runs at the beginning of the game

Parameters:
inventory A reference to the player's ingame inventory
startingArea A reference to the starting area (important for loading)
time A reference to the players "InGame Playtime"

force player to enter '0' or '1' or '2' if they do not enter the necessary input ask again

case 0 shall be the main menu

later case 1 will enter the Load Game Menu

the filename of the very first area
